title: Is it permissible to recite the dua in Funeral Prayer in one's own language?- Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: so I smile says is it permissible to recite the Dora said in the Janaza prayer in one's own language when you perform funeral prayer first stack beer read Fatiha second takbir of facilitation to the prophets third takbir we make dua for the deceased so it's saying can we make it in our own language answer is yes providing you don't know how to do it in Arabic if you know that you are in Arabic it should be done in Arabic otherwise there's no problem
